    • SavePartInfo

      public void SavePartInfo(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Provides "Save Button" Functionality Gets user input from text fields, and Validates the input and alerts the user if needed. Also, converts strings to int/double data types as needed. Radio button selection is broken into IF statements. Adds the new part if all validation checks are passed. Redirects user back to Main Menu (MainMenu.fxml), *FUTURE ENHANCEMENT* Checking the part name to see if it already exists in the current list of parts. Alternatively adding a description box to help differentiate parts of the same name, *FUTURE ENHANCEMENT* Checking to see if the Company Name on outsourced parts contains only numbers.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
